authorDescription.title: Hmm, well... Hi!
authorDescription.description:
The question arises spontaneously: why Oblivion?

Well, Oblivion is born upon the fact that I am a chronic forgetful person, upon the fact that I have to live my life in a well-ordered way, otherwise I would forget to do anything of what I have to do: almost everything has to be documented and well organized.

Jokes aside, Oblivion is my personal website, designed to indroduce myself to the World and, mostly, to experiment new programming trends and approaches in order to improve myself everyday.
...Did I forget to tell you that I am a programmer, didn't I?

“But who is the one writing?“, you could ask. Well, I am Batma... Ehr, maybe not actually. I am just your friendly neighbourhood Marco Guidolin.

Did I got your attention? Do you already think I am a hopeless nerd? Do You want to discover a little more about myself, this project or about what I do? Then all you have to do is click on the button down here, you won't regret it!

about.title: It’s-a Me, Mario!
about.subtitle: A little more about me, your storyteller

firstSection.title: Who is Marco Guidolin?
firstSection.content:
My name is Marco Guidolin, I‘m a guy born and raised in 1994 in Treviso, a city in the north-east of Italy, with the passion for thechnology and computers which grows since my youth.

My passions, beside programming, are cinema, music and photography. In my spare time I like riding my enduro dirt bike, an Husqvarna WR 125cc of 2000 which I‘ve lately restored by myself.

I‘ve always been passionate of science and particularly fascinated by astronomy. I also have a particular interest for all manual and handcraft works, thanks to my father working experience of woodworking.

born.title: The beginning
born.content: I was born in Treviso (Italy) the 2nd of March, 1994.

graduation.title: The degree
graduation.content: In June 2013 I graduated from Liceo Scientifico Statale Leonardo da Vinci High School of Treviso with a score of 85 out of 100.

university.title: University studies
university.content: In September 2013 I started my university studies at Ca‘ Foscari University of Venice, attending the Computer Science course.

sgc.title: Stage at SG Community
sgc.content: During July and August 2015 I did a curricular internship at SG Community, a company located in Treviso. During my internship I created a platform to help the company doing both content curation and content creation activities on behalf of their customers. Upon this project I built my bachelor degree thesis.

stageEgea.title: Stage at Egea Tecnologie Informatiche
stageEgea.content: From November 2016 until October 2017 I did an internship at Egea Tecnologie Informatiche in Marcon (Venice). With this long experience I was able to grow my knowledge about web programming with languages like PHP and JavaScript, both client and server side.

bachelorDegree.title: Bachelor degree
bachelorDegree.content: In March 2017 I got my bachelor degree in Computer Science with a score of 100 out of 110.

hFarmConsulting.title: Consulting experience at H-Farm
hFarmConsulting.content: During my work at Egea Tecnologie Informatiche I was sent for several months to the central office of H-Farm, a multinational company with its main office in Roncade (Treviso) with the qualification of external consultant. There I had the opportunity to work on projects of many financial and insurance multinational industries and to a series of complex POCs (proof of concept projects) of web applications for a well-known clothing factory.

today.title: Today
today.content: Nowadays I work at Egea Tecnologie Informatiche where I create, maintain and deploy web applications written in PHP and NodeJS.
